name: Publish to topic
description: Publishes messages to a ROS topic.

inputParameters.name: topic_name
inputParameters.description: Name of the topic to publish to, eg. /joint_states

inputParameters.name: topic_type
inputParameters.description: Type of the topic to publish to, eg. sensor_msgs/JointState

inputParameters.name: msg
inputParameters.description: The message to publish. It can be an instance of ROSMsg, a Python dict, or a JSON string.

outputParameters.name: is_advertised
outputParameters.description: Indicates if the topic is current advertised or not.
